job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen en onderhouden van web en mobiele applicaties met TypeScript, Node, React, React Native, GCP, Firebase en PostgreSQL.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of building and maintaining web and mobile applications, which is a fundamental software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Prioriteit geven aan verbindingen tussen de database, de betalingsdienstaanbieder, de app en het afdrukbeheersysteem.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves integrating different system components (database, payment provider, app, print management system), which falls under software integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Continue integratie en testgestuurde ontwikkelingsmethoden implementeren
job_tasks.justification: Implementing continuous integration and test-driven development are key practices in modern software operations and deployment pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: putten uit en bijdragen aan verschillende open source projecten
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to and leveraging open-source projects is a common software development practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Problemen oplossen en complexe problemen oplossen, in samenwerking met beveiligingsdeskundigen
job_tasks.justification: Problem-solving, especially in collaboration with other technical experts, is a core software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Het leven van abonnees positief beĂŻnvloeden en deel uitmaken van een bedrijf met een enorm groeipotentieel
job_tasks.justification: This phrase relates to understanding the business impact and potential, aligning with the definition of Business Understanding & Strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Werken in een klein, multidisciplinair team van professionals in een snelle startup-omgeving
job_tasks.justification: While this describes the work environment, the mention of working in a multidisciplinary team implies collaboration on development tasks.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met product- en ontwerpteams om te zorgen voor een naadloze gebruikerservaring.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration with product and design teams.

soft_skills.phrase: Blijf op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen in full stack ontwikkeling, generatieve AI en technologieĂŤn zoals Google Cloud, Cloud Functions, Firebase, Kubernetes en Docker.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the need to stay updated with new technologies, which aligns with learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Problemen oplossen en complexe problemen oplossen, in samenwerking met beveiligingsdeskundigen
soft_skills.justification: The phrase directly refers to problem-solving, including complex issues.

soft_skills.phrase: Werken in een klein, multidisciplinair team van professionals in een snelle startup-omgeving
soft_skills.justification: Working in a startup environment often implies a need for ownership and innovation due to the fast-paced nature and smaller team size.

profile.rationale: The job ad primarily focuses on core software development tasks (1.A.1) such as building and maintaining web and mobile applications using TypeScript, Node, React, React Native, GCP, Firebase, and PostgreSQL. While it mentions using AI models like GPT to enhance productivity and code quality, the core responsibility is software engineering, not the development or deep specialization in AI/ML models themselves. The AI usage is described as a tool to improve the software engineering process, fitting the profile of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer who builds software that integrates or is enhanced by AI.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines core software development responsibilities and mentions the use of AI (GPT) as a productivity tool. The technologies listed are predominantly software engineering related. The AI aspect is present but not the central focus of model development or deep AI specialization. The profile assignment is quite clear based on this balance.
